{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=BLW-04SAG |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/05/2004 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model=CRP-1 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NKRCRP-1, NKRCM9 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=IDT |cpu1_model=79RC32K438-200BB;IDT, 79RC32K438, -200BB, ZC0411P; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638D-TCB0 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb CM9 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112A |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8100BL |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SB |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=0000 |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.planex.net/spec/router/BLW-04SAG_Spec_Eng_v1.0.pdf Datasheet]
[http://download.modem-help.co.uk/mfcs-P/Planex/BLW-04SAG/ Downloads on '''modem-help.co.uk'''] "04/03/29" and "CRP01S0B" appears to be silkscreened on the mainboard in the FCC photos. The default SSID of this device may be '''wlan'''.
